Question: On her 48th birthday, this person was honored with a star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame.
Hints: This person has a Grammy, two Daytime Emmys, two Golden Globes, a Tony (for production, not acting), and an Oscar.
During the filming of Eddie, this person began dating co-star Frank Langella, a relationship which lasted until early 2000.
While on Broadway, this person's performance caught the eye of director Steven Spielberg.
